city state: – SunTrust Plaza Tower (GA00116) 303 Peachtree Street Atlanta, 30308
job description:
Career level position in Wholesale’s Data Management organization and member of a team primarily focused on Corporate Investment Banking and Capital Markets data. Possesses in-depth knowledge of Data Management practice and other related data disciplines. Applies knowledge of best practices, derived from experience, to solve a range of complex data-related technical, operational, and business problems. Partners with Team Lead and plays a significant role in large complex projects or initiatives. May lead smaller projects with manageable risks and resource requirements. Develops and fosters relationships with business owners and stakeholders involved with Data Governance initiatives. Serves as a liaison between business and technical teammates. Works independently and receives minimal guidance.

Minimum Requirements:

Bachelor’s degree and 5 years of related experience or an equivalent combination of education and experience. Advanced knowledge of Data Governance principles and standards with experience in providing related guidance to business and technology teammates. Demonstrated problem solving and analytical skills; creative thinker, always looking for a “better way” to deliver value, not stopped or discouraged by adversity. Understanding of basic Data Modeling concepts. Proficient in creating SQL queries and applying various data manipulation techniques for data analysis. Capable of performing mapping activities in support of data projects, capturing data flow and process to maintain data lineage. Ability to identify potential data remediation options to resolve data integrity, quality, confidentially, availability, and consistency issues

Independent, yet collaborative, respected by peers and others; decisive, assertive, with the ability to achieve results quickly. Responsible and accountable – someone who takes ownership and initiative. Passionate about working with data. Excellent written and verbal communication skills to interact with matrix teams and influence outcomes

Preferred Requirements:

Master's degree or MBA and 6 years of related experience. Previous experience in the banking industry. Corporate Investment Banking\Capital Markets Experience. Expert MS Excel and/or TOAD skills for data analysis. High level of proficiency with PowerPoint
